scripts.start: cross-env REQUEST_LOG_FILE=log.txt REQUEST_LOG_FORMAT=common DEBUG=notez:* SEQUELIZE_CONNECT=models/sequelize-sqlite.yaml NOTES_MODEL=sequelize USER_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:5858 node ./app.mjs
scripts.server1: cross-env REQUEST_LOG_FILE=log.txt REQUEST_LOG_FORMAT=common DEBUG=notez:* PORT=3001 node ./app.mjs
scripts.server2: cross-env REQUEST_LOG_FILE=log.txt REQUEST_LOG_FORMAT=common DEBUG=notez:* PORT=3002 node ./app.mjs
scripts.mongodb-start: cross-env DEBUG=notez:* MONGO_URL=mongodb://localhost/ MONGO_DBNAME=chap07 NOTES_MODEL=mongodb  USER_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:5858 node ./app.mjs
scripts.mongodb-server1: cross-env DEBUG=notez:* MONGO_URL=mongodb://localhost/ MONGO_DBNAME=chap07 NOTES_MODEL=mongodb PORT=3001 node ./app.mjs
scripts.mongodb-server2: cross-env DEBUG=notez:* MONGO_URL=mongodb://localhost/ MONGO_DBNAME=chap07 NOTES_MODEL=mongodb PORT=3002 node ./app.mjs
scripts.dl-slate: mkdir -p slate && npm run dl-slate-css && npm run dl-slate-min-css
